Hacker Rank - Day 2

September 22, 2015  |   ruby

Ruby Control Stuctures

Each

1 def scoring(array)
2     array.each do |user|
3         user.update_score
4     end
5 end

Unless

1 def scoring(array)
2     array.each do |user|
3         unless user.is_admin?
4             user.update_score
5         end
6     end
7 end

Infinite Loop

1 loop do
2     coder.practice
3     break if coder.oh_one?
4 end

Until

1 coder.practice until coder.oh_one?

Case (Bonus Question)

 1 def identify_class(obj)
 2     case obj
 3     when Hacker
 4         puts "It's a Hacker!"
 5     when Submission
 6         puts "It's a Submission!"
 7     when TestCase
 8         puts "It's a TestCase!"
 9     when Contest
10         puts "It's a Contest!"
11     else
12         puts "It's an unknown model"
13     end
14 end
